title: Correction to: Sex-specific strategies of resource utilization and determining mechanisms of Hippophae rhamnoides in response to community succession
content: This is a correction to: Baoli Fan, Pengfei Gao, Tingting Tian, Nana Ding, Yongkuan Wan, Xianhui Zhou, Sex-specific strategies of resource utilization and determining mechanisms of Hippophae rhamnoides in response to community succession, Journal of Plant Ecology, Volume 17, Issue 4, August 2024, rtae053, https://doi.org/10.1093/jpe/rtae053
siteTitle: Journal of Plant Ecology Current Issue
